django.contrib.gis.gdal.feature
===============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.gdal.feature


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.gdal.feature.Feature


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Feature(feat, layer)

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.contrib.gis.gdal.base.GDALBase`


   This class that wraps an OGR Feature, needs to be instantiated
   from a Layer object.


   .. py:attribute:: destructor


   .. py:attribute:: ptr


   .. py:property:: encoding


   .. py:property:: fid

      Return the feature identifier.


   .. py:property:: layer_name

      Return the name of the layer for the feature.


   .. py:property:: num_fields

      Return the number of fields in the Feature.


   .. py:property:: fields

      Return a list of fields in the Feature.


   .. py:property:: geom

      Return the OGR Geometry for this Feature.


   .. py:property:: geom_type

      Return the OGR Geometry Type for this Feature.


   .. py:method:: get(field)

      Return the value of the field, instead of an instance of the Field
      object.  May take a string of the field name or a Field object as
      parameters.



   .. py:method:: index(field_name)

      Return the index of the given field name.
